feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three features related to adding and wiring a Learn More button in AboutApproachSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing each frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH‑variable theme tokens with light/dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata and font preconnects loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Registers routes and renders the resolved route inside AppLayout with an ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Accordion‑style service selector that toggles a list of services and reports selection changes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays an error card with reload option on failure.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact info, social links, and hash‑based navigation handling via smooth scroll or router.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: About section with overview text, a Learn More button navigating to /about, and an approach grid.
Renders an FAQ section with toggleable questions and includes JSON-LD structured data for search engines.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Displays a contact CTA with buttons that scroll to or navigate to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Shows the homepage hero with text, image, and buttons that navigate to or scroll to the contact page.
Implements a responsive navbar with scroll-based styling and navigation to homepage sections or routes.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Presents a vertical step-by-step overview of the legal process.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Renders a grid of partner organizations with names and categories.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Renders a services grid with icons and navigation handlers for exploring more or scrolling to contact.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Displays a testimonials grid with client quotes using Card components.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Shows trust indicators with icons and animated stats highlighting experience and results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides a layout with navbar and smooth hash-based scrolling on route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, creating AuthClient instances and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a simple wrapper returning the actor and fetching state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, dark mode colors, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the about page with firm values, team members, features, and navigation handlers for services and contact.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission simulation, and UI sections for consultation scheduling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the home page by assembling multiple section components and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 message with a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports structured data describing legal services with names, icons, and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows service offerings from servicesData and includes a CTA to navigate to the contact page.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Provides a minimal client-side router with route registration, navigation, and subscription to path changes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines current project state and requested feature to add a 'Learn more about us' button linked to the About page, including existing related features and metadata.
